message: Let's be fair and efficient, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split so we can both benefit from this opportunity.
Alice, your offer was tempting, but let's be realistic. How about a 45/55 split? This way, you still get a good deal, and we avoid further delays.
Bob, this is my final offer. Let's settle this now and avoid further losses from inflation. A 52/48 split seems fair considering the time pressure.
